document.full_text: the clean air network has organized an auction of 51 environment-inspired works of modern art, in what it says is the first awareness and fund-raising event of its kind.
document.title: campaign to fight air pollution in hong kong gets visual
lines_and_colors: the clean air network has organized an auction of 51 environment-inspired works of modern art, in what it says is the first awareness and fund-raising event of its kind.
